title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4620.9 - Color Wheel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4620.9 - Color Wheel

State Regulations
(a) Equipment. A
wheel of variable size. The rim of the wheel is divided into sections, each of
which shows one color. The wheel has a corresponding layout. (b) The play. (1)
A player places a wager on one or more
colors on the layout, and the dealer spins the wheel. When the wheel stops, the
section in which the indicator arm rests is the winning color. (2)

The payoff odds shall be conspicuously
displayed on the layout. (3)

The
maximum bet shall be $5 or its equivalent in chips. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4620.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
